subject: Athletics and Sports
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ales Hemsky, Shawn Horcoff and Jarret Stoll each had a goal and an assist Monday night and Mathieu Garon made 35 saves for the Edmonton Oilers.
snippet: Ales Hemsky, Shawn Horcoff and Jarret Stoll each had a goal and an assist Monday night and Mathieu Garon made 35 saves for the Edmonton Oilers.
